title: How can I enjoy the game again?
body: You know, after all toxic and feeders, people decide the game in the first 10 minutes and wsate time up to the last 40. Every 40 matches or so, I do get into a game where all other 9 players are as good as me, and it's a fun tactical match. So how do I enjoy games that are lost before minute 10, since I will always stomp or be stomped?
